short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Annote is a note taking application that starts with what you read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Annote lets you highlight and annotate the things you read on the web.  It also allows you to tag and connect your notes together, make takeaways, and create a full connected and searchable graph of the things that you've learned.

We believe that reading is best done when you can engage, respond and connect to the material.  


Key Features:

Effortless Highlighting: Simply select the text you want to highlight, and Annote will apply your a highlight color to it.

Inline Annotations: Add annotations to highlighted text directly within the web page. Your comments and insights will be seamlessly integrated into the page's content, ensuring a smooth and intuitive browsing experience.

Centralized Annotation Library: Access your collection of highlights and annotations on a dedicated webpage, where you can view, edit, or delete your notes, as well as search for specific annotations by keyword or source URL.

Source Tracking: Annote automatically records the web page URL where each highlight and annotation was made, allowing you to quickly revisit the original source for context and reference.

Easy Sharing: Share your highlights and annotations with friends, classmates, or colleagues through a simple link, fostering collaboration and discussion around online content.

Cross-Device Compatibility: Your highlights and annotations are synced to your account, so you can access them from any device with the Annote extension installed.

With Annote, you can revolutionize the way you interact with online content, making it easier than ever to capture, organize, and share your thoughts and insights. Whether you're conducting research, studying for a class, or simply browsing the web, Annote is the perfect companion for a more engaging and productive online experience.
